name: Cold Tracks
description:
Hi. We are Late Owl a Video game company based of a University project in Høyskolen Kristiania, Norway, Oslo.

Presenting to you is Cold Tracks a survival/walking simulator set in Northern-Norway.

You wake up alone at camp to discover that all of your friends have disappeared. Survive the cold, whilst unraveling the mystery by notes and items left behind by your friends.

Late Owl team:

Lukas Matthew Wolff                    Product Owner & Programmer

Egil Mikael Johansen                     Producer & Programmer

Jonathan Prestmoen                      Marketing Executive & Document Manager

Ingrid Margit Hagen                       Level Designer & Artist

Oda Haugdal Nordhagen              Writer & Story board artist
